mapper.insert: insert into PaymentAccount(id, accountName, accountNo, paymentMethod) values(#{id}, #{accountName}, #{accountNo}, #{paymentMethod})
mapper.update: update PaymentAccount set accountName = #{accountName}, accountNo = #{accountNo}, paymentMethod = #{paymentMethod} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select count (*) from PaymentAccount where accountName = #{arg0}
select * from PaymentAccount where accountName like #{arg0}
